name: IT system administrator (DevOps)
description:
Great opportunity to join a strong team of software engineers passionate about breeding the best ideas and using state-of-the-art computer science theories and software engineering practices to develop innovative software. The team enjoys a very strong team-spirit and continuously strives to improve its performance by obtaining, sharing and exploiting knowledge among developers. For the development of our core strategic systems, we are currently looking for a very experienced, top motivated, hands-on:

IT SYSTEMS ADMINISTRATOR - DEVOPS

ROLE

  • Provide IT system administration services to DEV / SQA Teams and global operations.
  • Manage customers side systems running applications and database systems including storage, monitoring & backup responsibilities.
  • Deploy and operate solutions and systems using industry standard tools (Ansible, Jenkins, Terraform …).
  • Perform security maintenance on the customers side system in line with the company’s global policies.
  • Maintain the CMDB, SW configurations/versioning of all IT related items.
  • Configure and operate the solution monitoring tools.
  • Collaborate with SW & IT global teams around the world.
  • Report on system health and escalate issues if needed.
  • Contribute to share, evolve infrastructure standards / best practices within global DevOps community.

PROFILE

  • Master degree in a technical field.
  • At least 5 years of system administration experience required.

  • Background in service provisioning in a production environment such as a data center or customer consulting services.

  • Experience with operating system administration:
    • RHEL, CentOS is a must;
    • Windows Server is a plus.
  • Knowledge of:
    • Docker, Docker Compose is a must;
    • Java, NodeJS, modern C++ is a plus.
  • Ability to develop tools / scripts needed for automating infrastructure, development skills, version/configuration control, knowledge of Bash is a strong plus.
  • Familiar with microservices architecture concepts.
  • DevOps mindset, experience with CI/CD concepts and technologies (Ansible, Bitbucket, Jenkins, JFrog).
  • Experience with virtualization technology (VMware) and shell scripting for provisioning and automation.
  • Experience with LDAP/IAM administration and Software Defined Infrastructure.
  • Experience of Agile (SCRUM & Kanban) and ITIL is a plus, familiar with Jira and Confluence.
  • Knowledge of messaging systems, such as Apache Kafka, is a plus.
  • International experience and willingness to travel.
  • Good level of English and Russian.

JOIN US !

  • Our success comes from our highly skilled and talented employees.
  • Respectful entrepreneurship and long-term vision are key for success.
  • Our people contribute to a more secure world.
  • Diversity at all levels of an organization is a strength.

We are offer an exciting and challenging role, with great potential for personal development within a unique organization in a fascinating and fast-growing industry. Your file will be handled with upmost confidentiality and discretion.
